𓄑 Zahn : Determinant sometimes used as letter 'z' (tooth)
𓄑 Letter D/T dent / tusk ?

𒁹 dash ≈ teeth : 𒁹 ≈ 𒌋 ≈ 𓎆 "10" ten ≈ dent 𓄑 𓏤 see numbers

𓄑 𓏤 tooth 1 𐤆 šol solo 10 Zahn ስን sən שִׁנָּא سِنّ sinn
𓍿 𓊃 𓏏 𓄑 tooth cznt ⋍ dents دنتان dantán দান্দান dandan dzino ⇔ dash 𒁹
𓍿 𓊃 𓏏 𓄑 tooth czth ⋍ śade 𐎕 𐤑 ⋍ tooth ጥርስ ṭərs ὀδούς odoús ⇔ tusk … 喙 chhùi?
𓇋 𓃀 𓎛 𓄑 𓏤 tooth, tusk ivory
𓈖 𓅘 𓎛 𓂧 tooth Nager 牙 ngà
𓈖 𓅘 𓎛 𓆓 𓏏 𓄑 tooth, tusk Nagezahn
𓈖 𓆓 𓎛 𓏏 𓄑 tooth ⇔ dent permutation

ZAHN

𒊿 zin Zinn Zahn 𒊿𒉡 šin-nu ስን sən שִׁנָּא سِنّ sinn tooth

𒅗 zu₂ ⋍ Zahn in 𒅗𒄠𒋛 “ivory” שֶׁנְהָב shenhav

𓄑 zhino dinu songá “tooth” @ Bantu

𓄑 haƙori hakori κέρα 𓄏 kHorn ⇔ 𓄓 ?

𓋴 𓊪 𓂧 𓇮 sharp: spitz ⇔ Spieß 𓄏 𓄑
𓋴 𓃀 𓇋 𓏏 𓎸 𓄑 Spitzen / Spaß
𓈙 𓊪 𓏏 𓆡 Spott ⇔ spikes

𓊪 𓊃 𓎛 𓄑 𓀁 bite, sting #pzhⁿ pieksen beißen ⇔ pike, bite ⇔ push

𒉌𒋝 bi-šik | bite | Biss(ig) Beissen בײַסן baysn phaizhan 𓊪 𓊃 𓎛 𓄑 𓀁 !
𒉌𒋝 ni-šik | bite | 𐎐 𐎘 𐎋 nṯk נגס nagás “bite” => नाग nāgá נָחָשׁ nakhásh nip 𓊪 ⋍ 𒋝

Bone ⇔ ivory 𓍋 𓃀 𓅱 𓄑

𓇋 𓃀 𓎛 𓄑 𓏤 tooth, tusk | ivory
𓂧 𓃀 𓎛 𓏏 𓏛 𓏥 ⋍ 𓂧 𓄑 𓎛 𓅱 # dbḥ (requirements)

𓆼 𓄿 𓃀 𓃯 Keifer ⇔ 𓆼 𓄿 𓃀 𓃀 𓄒𓄒 Kiefer > Jibher:jbḥ=𓄑 ivory Hieb, heap ⇔ 𓂝𓃀𓄏𓏤 horn
